title: Showcase Presents: Our Army at War, Vol. 1
description: This value priced collection features over 500 pages of war stories from the early 1950s starring a wide variety of soldiers in a variety of settings, boasting, as the covers said, "Explosive battle action!" Stories include: "Dig Your Foxhold Deep!" "Frightened Hero" "Battle Souvenir" "Dive Bomber" "I, The Gun" "Undersea Raider" "Flying Blind"
author: Robert Kanigher
